Why would you sell out the millions that liked you well brother you mite not be able to come back from this, I know for me and my family we will no longer support anything you do now Steve your done black people don't think you were right, although you have a right o meet with who ever you want, you just forgot what this man said and feels about black people and people of color. So I'm throwing out everything Steve Harvey from my house, such items like your book, your films, when I watch the Kings I will fast forward pass your ass Steve, why do some people get a little and decide to bow down to hate, you can't help your people by bowing down, that's what he wants fool, and you took the bate, Bow down to me DT, your done Steve.
